name: Battle of the Green Fork
attacker_commander: Roose Bolton, Wylis Manderly, Medger Cerwyn, Harrion Karstark, Halys Hornwood
defender_commander: Tywin Lannister, Gregor Clegane, Kevan Lannister, Addam Marbrand

name: Battle of the Camps
attacker_commander: Robb Stark, Tytos Blackwood, Brynden Tully

name: Battle of the Stony Shore
note: Greyjoy's troop number based on the Battle of Deepwood Motte, in which Asha had 1000 soldier on 30 longships. That comes out to ~33 per longship. In the Battle of the Stony Shore, Theon has 8 longships, and just we can estimate that he has 8*33 =265 troops.

name: Battle of Torrhen's Square
note: Greyjoy's troop number comes from the 264 estimate to have arrived on the stony shore minus the 20 Theon takes to attack Winterfell. Thus 264-20=244

name: Battle of Winterfell
note: It isn't mentioned how many Stark men are left in Winterfell, other than "very few".

name: Sack of Winterfell
defender_commander: Rodrik Cassel, Cley Cerwyn, Leobald Tallhart
note: Since House Bolton betrays the Starks for House Lannister, we code this battle as between these two houses. Greyjoy men, numbering only 20, don't play a major part in the fighting and end up dying anyway.

name: Battle of Oxcross
defender_commander: Stafford Lannister, Roland Crakehall, Antario Jast
